resources.string:
Removing this authenticator will prevent you from generating codes for this account.
This does not mean that two factor authentication is disabled on your account.

Deleting this authenticator may prevent you from accessing your account.
Please make sure that either two factor authentication is disabled or that you have the recovery codes.

Are you sure you want to continue?
You don\'t have any authenticators here.
You don\'t have any authenticators to backup.
The secret must be longer than 16 characters.
The authenticator must generate at least 6 digits.
The period must be longer than 10 seconds.
The QR code is not in the correct format.
An authenticator with this secret key already exists.
Restored {0} new authenticators and {1} new categories.
A category with this name already exists.
Are you sure you want to delete this category?
You don\'t have any categories set up yet.
Select a Authenticator Pro backup to restore its authenticators.\nYou can choose a backup file stored on this device or you can load a backup directly from cloud storage.
Save your authenticators to a password encrypted backup file.\nYou can save it to your device storage or you can upload it to cloud storage in case you lose your device.
Enter a password to securely encrypt your backup file. If you do not wish to password protect the file, leave the password empty.
The password is incorrect or the file is corrupt.
The selected file is not a Authenticator Pro backup file.
The external storage permission is required to backup / restore authenticators.
Load backup file from device storage
Restore backup file from cloud storage
Save backup file to device storage
Please enter your password or use a fingerprint to access your authenticators.
You have not chosen a password, your backup will not be encrypted and your secret keys will be vunerable. Do you wish to continue?
There was an error unlocking the encrypted database. You must clear the application data before continuing.
The camera permission must be granted in order to scan a QR code.
Google Play is not installed on your device.
Require authentication to access authenticators. This feature requires that you set up a lock screen on your device.
Highly recommended. Uncheck this option if you need to use third-party backup tools such as Titanium Backup, Helium, Super Backup, adb backup etc...
Use a dark theme throughout the app.
Rate Authenticator Pro on the Google Play store.
View the Authenticator Pro repository on GitHub. You can report an issue, request more icons and features.
Thanks for downloading Authenticator Pro.\nKeep your online accounts secure and protected with the best open-source authentication app.
Authenticator Pro is compatible with most providers and accounts. It is 100% compatible with Google Authenticator enabled services.
Backup your authenticators with strong encryption. In case you lose your device, you can always gain access to your accounts. Save to cloud storage or to your device.
Organise your authenticators into categories and even change the order with a simple hold and drag.
If you prefer, you can enable a dark theme in the settings. All icons will adapt to match their new background.
